name: Swamp of Volumetricks
description:
Looping animation in Blender, following some tutorial probably (this is one from the archives).
Skill: Medium
Time: ~2 hours maybe?
Secrets: Hide your seams with volumetric for easy looping. Also the final colour scheme is a total accident thanks to a happy mistake when trying to shift the black level in KDENLIVE.
Comments: Fog makes things look cool. Blender is fun. Not my best work in this style but I do more abstract stuff like this over photorealism.
